name: Kings Cards
description: This is were you can pre-order King Cards a card game where you can decide the fate or growth of your kingdom! You can do a lot of things in this game such as collect items and find secrets. Also you can command your kingdom into wars and strategize a plan to win. You have stats that you have to balance and people that you have to make happy. You have to balance everything to keep them up. Will you be a good enough king to last?
